settings.text: The AI voice recorder powered by ChatGPT-4. Seamlessly transcribe, translate, and summarize your conversations into actionable knowledge. All in a device thinner than your phone's camera.
We make things that work better and last longer. Our products solve real problems with clean design and honest materials.

Instantly convert voice to text with
stunning accuracy. Capture every
word without lifting a finger.

Break down language barriers with
real-time translated transcriptions
for global meetings and travel.

Instantly distill hours of audio into
key takeaways, action items,
or even a first draft of a report.
Don't just read your transcriptâ€”interrogate it. Get instant, intelligent answers to complex questions about your audio.
Transform linear text into a visual mind map. Instantly grasp core concepts and the relationships between them.
Automatically label who said what in a conversation. No more confusion when reviewing notes.
Clearly Pick Up Voices from Up to 10 Meters Away Perfect for Lectures, Conferences, and Interviews.
Clearly Pick Up Voices from Up to 10 Meters Away Perfect for Lectures, Conferences, and Interviews.

Power should not come at the cost of portability.
The UMESL is designed to be a seamless extension of your workflow.
Securely Attach to the Back of Your Phone, tablet, or Any Metal Surface

section_nb3GCH.name: Snap It. Stick It. Always Ready.

settings.text: Built on a foundation of security, value, and reliability, so you can focus on what matters.

Your recordings are stored on a dedicated
private cloud with end-to-end encryption.
Security is our guarantee.

Enjoy 400 free minutes of transcription
every month. Experience a pure, focused,
and completely ad-free app.

With 15 hours of continuous recording
and a 2-hour fast charge, it's always
ready for your longest days.
